targets.query: SELECT mean("memused")/mean("memtotal") * 100 FROM "memory" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host fill(null)
SELECT mean("used")/mean("total") FROM "system" WHERE ("type" = 'dir' AND "nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("memused")/mean("memtotal") * 100 FROM "memory" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host WHERE object='nodes'
list.name: server
